programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: The family rallies around Damien after his arrest. Anthony is tasked to talk to Brayden about puberty. Olivia is beginning to seriously regret moving back to Rose's place.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Food Fight
programme.desc: (Encore) CNN called cendol a Singaporean dessert. That got Malaysia green with envy. But as Food Fight attempts to get the scoop on who created cendol, it discovers this may be more than a two-country fight.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions. In recent years, these extreme weather events have become more and more commonplace. Using incredible archive and astonishing user-generated footage of some of the most extraordinary weather the planet has ever seen, we'll relive these weather spectacles in astonishing minute by minute detail, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event on camera.

programme.title: Planet Action S2
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Wild Thailand

programme.title: Miniforce: Super Dino Power (S3)

programme.title: The Enchanted Village Of Pinocchio

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin NEW 1
programme.desc: On a faraway island, there lives Pororo, a very inquisitive and gleeful little gentoo penguin, Poby, a good-natured polar bear, Eddy, a smug nosy fennec fox, Loopy, a shy and timid but sweet little American beaver, and finally, Crong, a little mischievous green spinosaurus. Join our friends in their fun adventures!

programme.desc: 《三男一旅》的三位主持人郑斌辉、苏智诚和黄靖伦，在卸下象爸爸的身份后，从亚洲象种源繁育中心转战亚洲象观测保护小组，他们又将在繁茂的原始森林里碰到哪些状况呢？而他们又是否能躲过野象的追击，顺利完成在原始森林里的各项挑战，成功为新加坡残疾人士协会筹得善款呢.

programme.title: 寻医
programme.desc: 每10名菲律宾人病死当中，仍有6人临死前无法得到医疗照顾。主持人吴俐璇千里迢迢到与世隔绝的沙坦岛，拜访在孤岛下乡行医的年轻医生，了解他如何在资源匮乏的环境下，只身照顾将近2000名岛民.

programme.title: 左撇子妻子

programme.title: 婉通夫人
programme.desc: Ep 15: 兰廷嫉妒阿贵屡次为婉通冒险而针对婉通。婉通告诉兰庭阿贵错在偷偷把她带走，阿畅错在一再伤害无辜的人而婉通错在选择和阿贵走。Ep 16: 阿畅为了逼婉通出现，夜晚突袭西帕绽家。幸好昆达珠相助识破阿畅诡计。婉通在逃亡过程中身体不适，古曼童告知婉通怀有身孕.

programme.title: 绝妙的遗产

programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: 钢铁大叔 黄仲昆 及 黄远跟着 民雄 到部落玩啰！民雄带着黄仲昆父子前往花莲的奇美部落体验当地特有的 文化泛舟旅程。他们一起感受有「活的博物馆」之称的阿美族奇美部落的特殊游程。这趟旅程更像是‘'耍Man之旅‘' - 砍木头、爬树、撒网捕鱼。再去一趟既冒险又有文化史观的‘'泛舟行程‘'！这个小小的部落是传说中阿美族文化的发源地。至今延续的男子阶级制度,让黄仲昆父子感受了特有的旅行经验。今年夏天你还在找能玩水有文青风的行程吗.

programme.title: 把关者们
programme.desc: 这是一个讲述香港海关的故事，透过版权及商标调查科、贸易管制处总贸易管制和海关毒品调查课各个部门，带领一众海关菁英及年青新晋，展示出智慧海关的新面貌，以及秉持护法守关、专业承担的宗旨，为社会的稳定与繁荣作出贡献.

programme.title: SNAP
programme.desc: What was worn hundreds of years ago are most likely not worn again today, for practicality reasons. SNAP looks into the past to learn about the heavily adorned and decorated costumes by dignitaries and royals and compare that to present times where clothes are more casual and non-restricting. We learn about the intricate handmade art of "sulaman" that may take months to make but does it fit into the "now" culture where everything is needed and gotten "instantly"?
